title: Which are the best universities to study international relations in Europe? - Quora

response.answer_text: As for me International Relations is one of the most interesting study program ever. I study it in Poland university. So, I know that the best countries in Europe to study International Relations are: United Kingdom, Ukraine and Poland. Here are the best universities to study International Relations: University of Southampton, in United KingdomKamianets-Podilskyi Ivan Ohiienko National University in UkraineVISTULA Main School of Tourism and Recreation, in Poladn (by the way, it`s my university)Here (Bachelor in International Relations) you can find more information about International Relations program and universities.

There are many great universities in Europe at which to study international relations. LSEOxfordCambridgeSciences Po-ParisCollege of Europe in Belgium There's lots of other great programs as well in Switzerland, Scotland, Germany, etc. Europe is blessed through ERASMUS to have a high level of international circulation of students, so many universities across the continent have great engaging seminars and lectures incorporating that critical international perspective in IR courses.
